sections.heading: funds; depository bonds; expiration
sections.text: All bonds given to secure deposits of public money by the state or by any county, except for deposit guaranty bonds defined under section 77-2387, shall expire on January 1 of each year.SourceLaws 1927, c. 34, ยง 4, p. 158;C.S.1929, ยง 77-2509;Laws 1933, c. 128, ยง 1
